unnormalised: Pytthagorasacho sid'dhant ugddas dovorat: a^2 + b^2 = c^2, hea zagear c mhunnttlear karnn; Toxench, sin θ = sammuk/karnn, cos θ = laginchyo/karnn, tan θ = sammuk/laginchyo, konnanchi gonnna korpak upyogi, trikonnanchea bhitor.
normalised: Pythagorean siddhantacho ugddas dovorat: a square zodd b square soman c square, zantunt c mhanje karn; tannch, sine theta mhanje samkhi bazuk bhagile karn, cosine theta mhanje laguchi bazuk bhagile karn, tangent theta mhanje samkhi bazuk bhagile laguchi bazuk, konnache ganit trikonantlean korpak upyogi.
